success.TRANSLATIONS_ADDED: New title translations added to aliases.

errors.NOT_A_FILE: Cannot translate the title of nothing, because nothing doesn't have anything, notably no title.

settings.TARGET_LANGS_FIELD_DESC: Comma-separated list of language codes (e.g.: "fr, de")
settings.AUTO_TRANSLATE_TOGGLE_DESC: Enable to automatically add translations of the note title when you create a new note or change the title of an existing one
settings.DATE_FORMAT_FIELD_DESC: When auto translate is on, titles matching this date format won't be translated. Can be useful for for daily notes. Default: YYYY-MM-DD.
settings.IGNORE_REGEX_FIELD_DESC: When auto translate is on, titles matching this custom regex won't be translated.
settings.TRANSLATOR_SELECTOR_DESC: Google Translate is more widely used and supports more languages, DeepL is great and easier to set up.
settings.API_KEY_FIELD_DESC: Create a ${translator} API key and paste it here. This is mandatory for the plugin to work. (The API key is stored in the Obsidian config files in your Obsidian valut location.)
